caption.title: Viral loads of RRV-T48 and RRV-T48-nsP1 6M are equivalent in Mavs -/- mice.
caption.p: WT (n = 7/group) or Mavs -/- (n = 10/group) C57BL/6 mice were inoculated in the left rear footpad with 1,000 PFU of RRV-T48 or RRV-T48-nsP1 6M. At 5 dpi, viral RNA levels in skeletal muscle tissue were quantified by qRT-PCR. Data are pooled from three independent experiments. P values were determined by one-way ANOVA with a Tukeyâ€™s multiple comparison test. **, P < 0.01; ***, P < 0.001.
